simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-count-objects - Count unpacked number of objects and their disk consumption

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: This counts the number of unpacked object files and disk space consumed by them, to help you decide when it is a good time to repack.

listitem.simpara: In addition to the number of loose objects and disk space consumed, it reports the number of in-pack objects, number of packs, disk space consumed by those packs, and number of objects that can be removed by running git prune-packed.

simplesect.title: Documentation
simplesect.simpara: Documentation by Junio C Hamano and the git-list <git@vger.kernel.org>.
